title: (x) Virgin Waters script logo - hand drawn {Geoff}
content:
Urgent! Please help identify this font. It’s not done by hand!  
Thanks!!!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103155200im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/vwlogo.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Charlie and the Chocolate Factory movie logo - custom drawn {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103155200/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19331 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) License plate fonts - various {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103155200/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19362 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rgbmaster

comments.content:
Well, it does look like a quick hack job in Illustrator, both i’s are different down to the tittle. :^)

Custom.

well, i did it to up the scale - this is the original:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103155200im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logovw2.gif)

But the i’s are still different, aren’t they? ;-)

I think it could just have been done with Illustrator’s stroke tool. It doesn’t seem like a font, anyway. My guess…
The original lettering was done by hand for sure. That’s no font.
Thanks everyone, i guess this is by hand then.

It certainly is a hand job.

The r’s are different too.

Nick Cooke
